• Easy and fun play: It is fun to learn how to play easily and to play high score.

• Free iq tests.
• Comfortable Games: It is designed to be able to continue playing anytime, anywhere without any time limit.
• End of data worry: You can play offline without worrying about Wi-Fi or data.
• Simple rules and Easy control.
• Various stages.

• Low storage games.
